Report Abuse Google is becoming what Microsoft once was- a giant corporation that wants to control everything we do on computers. But it's even worse, because it has a close relationship with the liberal portions of our government, and is expanding beyond just the computer realm into the real world. And its only significant opponents are Microsoft and Facebook, which aren't really any better at this point.
